title: Starting from the Dragon Tribe - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mystery   School Life   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Bloodlines   Dragons   Fanfiction   Fantasy World   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Level System   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Transformation Ability   Transmigration
author: Flying Elephant,   起飞的大象
description: A boy with abnormal physical prowess, Lu Chen, arrives in the world of the Dragon Clan. Lu Chen is shocked when faced with the enrollment for Cassell College—it's full of beings who have dragon blood! Only he isn't a hybrid... How will he pass the 3E exam? This is the story of a boy who eventually reaches the pinnacle of Cassell College.>
